name: Broccoli Casserole II
author: JENCOOK
summary: This is my grandmother's casserole, and her standard addition to our family dinners.  Leftovers aren't leftover long.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package chopped frozen broccoli, thawed and drained
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (8 ounce) jar processed cheese spread with jalapeno
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a saucepan bring 2 cups water to a boil
Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes
Melt margarine in a medium skillet over medium heat
Saute onions and celery until tender
In a 2 quart casserole dish combine onions, celery, cooked rice, broccoli, mushroom soup and processed cheese spread; mix well
Bake in preheated oven for 35 minutes
